name: DISCOnnected (snapking02)
description:
This is a platform game where the player gathers people for a disco party to be held in an online video meeting.

allow everyone to get to know each other better and reconnect.

Control keys:
A - left
D - Right
SPACE - Jump

Maybe the connection with people has already been lost.

You are Disconnected...

Start the adventure of your life and bring joy back to the world by reconnecting the people around you.

You will find them.
You will make them celebrate together.
I believe in you.

Created during the Global Game Gam 2021 whose theme was "Lost and Found".

Although there were many more things I wanted to do... the big idea was that we lost touch with each other and the Player fixes the wifi to organize a disco party in a video call.
At the end it was supposed to be the full screen where you see the video call and the characters dancing to the disco beat.

subscribe to my youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/asafsnapiri
